title: Pregnant women who work nights may have a greater risk of miscarriage

title_detail.value: Pregnant women who work nights may have a greater risk of miscarriage

summary: Working two or more night shifts in a week may increase a pregnant woman's risk of miscarriage the following week by around a third, shows a prospective study.

summary_detail.value: Working two or more night shifts in a week may increase a pregnant woman's risk of miscarriage the following week by around a third, shows a prospective study.
